title: ranked teams
body: wtf i cant make ranked 3s game fix it plz

replies.body: so we can't play at 2 am anymore? or in the morning? why?

*ZombieMaster* provided accurate info, ranked teams are only available during the time the queues are scheduled. Our complete post on this can be found [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/ranked-5s-queue-returns-during-scheduled-windows) The guide mentions ranked 5's, but the information also applies to ranked 3's as well.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Along with ranked 5s, ranked 3s is currently only available at certain times of the day. On weekdays, it is available from 4pm to midnight PDT, so it should be available now.
